We understand what it means to be complete in him, and we understand why Paul would tell them that they are complete in him, is because they've been saved, they've been born again. By grace you're saved, and hath raised us up together and made us sit together in heavenly places in Christ Jesus, that in the ages to come he might show the exceeding riches of his grace and his kindness toward us through Christ Jesus. For by grace are you saved through faith, and that not of yourselves, but of the gift of God, not of works lest any man should boast.
